text:
Bebo is a social networking website. Bebo stands for "Blog early, blog often". It started in January 2005. It is mostly used by teenagers. It is now one of the main social networking sites on the Internet.
About.
Bebo has many features that are available for its users, such as Gmail, Yahoo! Mail and AOL Mail, and media recommendations with these functions the individual has more choices for searching information on one website.
Also a new platform is available “Lifestream” automatically lets the user see updates from their friends and family, all profiles from Facebook, Myspace, YouTube, Flickr, Twitter are synced together. Which is a convenient tool to get instant updates, which include being able to share: photos, videos, stories, records, and scheduled appointments.
Bebo.com is available on a mobile device, which the user can log into their account to find out what new material has been posted by their friends and family. They can receive SMS updates and alerts, update their Bebo profile, add photos to their gallery, send virtual gifts and access exclusive mobile content.
